name: ToxoplasmosisTestsForToxoplasmaGondiiIgGIgMIgAOrIgEAntibodyInBlood
title: Toxoplasmosis (Tests for Toxoplasma gondii IgG IgM IgA or IgE Antibody in Blood)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Toxoplasma gondii IgG IgM IgA or IgE Antibody in Blood.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Toxoplasma gondii IgG IgM IgA or IgE Antibody in Blood),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
